descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Evolution of the Earth's dynamic system and its record through geological time. Emphasis of the course is on the evolution of life as determined from the evidence of the fossil record.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Earth System History, Steven M. Stanley, W. H. Freeman, 4th edition, 2014, ISBN-13: 978-1-4292-5526-4
